title: Drawing, "Apollo in his Chariot with Aurora, Sala Ottogonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05
medium:
Pen and brown ink, brown wash, black chalk on laid paper
Support: white laid paper laid down
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description:
Pageant moving toward left; inscribed in graphite square, sides divided into 20 parts.
Scale: verso.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Apollo in his Chariot with Aurora, Sala Ottogonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05.
1804–05. Pen and brown ink, brown wash, black chalk on laid paper
Support: white laid paper laid down. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3270.
